channel.title: Marshall Elementary School News
channel.description: News and announcements from Marshall Elementary School, including events, activities, and important dates.

item.title: Monthly PTG Meeting - November 10th
item.description:
Monthly PTG Meeting scheduled for November 10, 2025 from 6:00-7:00 PM in the Marshall Cafeteria. All are invited to attend this Parent-Teacher Group gathering.

Add to Calendar: Google Calendar | iCal | Outlook

View original newsletter

item.title: November Breakfast and Lunch Menus
item.description:
The November 2025 breakfast and lunch menus are now available for Marshall Elementary. The breakfast menu includes items like Mini Chocolate Chip French Toast, Breakfast Burritos, Pancake on a Stick, and various donut options. 100% fruit juice, assorted fruit selection, and milk are included with every breakfast. The lunch menu features options such as Popcorn Chicken Dinner Roll, Mac & Cheese, Chicken Tenders, Pizza varieties, and a Holiday Meal with Roast Turkey and Gravy on November 19th. Choice of milk is included with every lunch. School is closed November 4, 24-25, and 26-28 for Thanksgiving break.

View original newsletter

item.title: Marshall Free Pantry for Students
item.description:
The Marshall Free Pantry is located at the front left side of the school near the gym doors and is open to all students. The pantry offers free food, hygiene products, and school supplies including veggies, fruit, pasta, soup, applesauce, snacks, school supplies, body wash, shampoo, and toothpaste. For questions, donations, or suggestions, contact Chrissy, Marshall Social Worker at 513-273-3611 or rolfesc@talawanda.org.

View original newsletter

item.title: PTG Thanks Families for Halloween Parade
item.description:
The Parent Teacher Group (PTG) thanks all families who attended their Halloween parade. They hope families enjoyed the coffee, doughnuts, and fellowship with Marshall families at the event. The message is accompanied by festive Halloween-themed pumpkin decorations.

View original newsletter

item.title: November Breakfast and Lunch Menus
item.description:
The November 2025 breakfast and lunch menus for Marshall Elementary are now available.

Breakfast includes items like Mini Chocolate Chip French Toast, pancakes, breakfast burritos, and donuts. 100% fruit juice, assorted fruit, and milk are included with every breakfast.

Lunch features options such as Popcorn Chicken Dinner Roll, Mac & Cheese, pizza varieties, chicken tenders, and a special Holiday Meal with Roast Turkey and Gravy on November 19th. Choice of milk is included with every lunch.

School is closed November 4th, 24th-28th for Thanksgiving break. Menus are subject to change based on product availability.

View original newsletter

item.title: Marshall Mondays School Spirit Initiative
item.description:
Marshall Mondays begin on October 20th and continue every Monday through the end of the school year. Students are encouraged to show school spirit and pride by wearing: - Talawanda gear - Marshall Elementary shirt - Red, white, and blue colors

Go Brave!

Add to Calendar: Google Calendar | iCal | Outlook

View original newsletter

item.title: Marshall Free Pantry for Students
item.description:
The Marshall Free Pantry is located at the front left side of the school near the gym doors and provides free food, hygiene products, and school supplies to all students. Available items include veggies, fruit, pasta, soup, applesauce, snacks, school supplies, body wash, shampoo, and toothpaste. For questions, donations, or suggestions, contact Chrissy, Marshall Social Worker at 513-273-3611 or rolfesc@talawanda.org.
